PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-07082008-04-11,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of PHILIP DAVID HOWELL of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, representing the region set out in subparagraph 11(3)(a)(iii) of the Act, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
